data.title: Lisa Loiacono: 5 facts to know about Christopher Lloyd's wife
data.meta_description: LISA LOIACONO is a real estate agent from Sotheby's International Realty. Here are the top 5 facts you probably didn't know about Christopher Lloyd's wife.
data.text:
Before 2016, not many people knew anything about Lisa Loiacono. But her association with actor Christopher Lloyd catapulted her profile. As a result, Lisa has appeared on red carpet events alongside her husband. However, despite the two being together for more than five years, many people have little information about Lisa, including her background, career, ethnicity, and relationship with Christopher Lloyd.

Lisa Loiacono is an American real estate agent who works for Sotheby’s International Realty. But apart from her profession as a realtor, Lisa is well known as the wife of Back to the Future actor Christopher Lloyd.

The couple has been together since 2016 and enjoys a relationship that has been out of the public. However, because of Lisa’s low-profile life, many people who follow Christopher Lloyd have little information about his fifth wife. So, what are some unknown facts about Lisa Loiacono, and when did she become Christopher Lloyd's wife?

What are the top facts about Lisa Loiacono?

Many people can only categorise Lisa Loiacono as a celebrity wife. But the actress has been together with her husband for six years despite being 32 years younger. Here are some facts about Lisa you should know.

1. Her husband has never had children

Lisa Loiacono’s husband, Christopher Lloyd, has been in five marriages. He has achieved a lot, especially participating in kid-friendly films. But at 83 years of age and marrying five wives, Lloyd has never had his own children. Furthermore, his current age only suggests he is certainly not planning to have any children with Lisa Loiacono.

2. Lisa Loiacono’s net worth is $2 million

Loiacono has worked in the real estate industry throughout her career, from where she derived her salaries. Her work and association with Christopher Lloyd have made her wealthy in the process. Some publications estimate that Lisa Loiacono has a net worth of $2 million.

3. Lisa Loiacono has a child from a previous relationship

Lisa Loiacono was a divorcee before meeting Christopher Lloyd. In her previous relationship, Lisa welcomed a child named Jacob. It is unknown when Jacob was born. However, Christopher became Jacob’s stepfather after marrying Lisa. Unfortunately, Lloyd has never had children despite marrying early at 21 years and divorcing four women. So Jacob could be as well be the son he never had.

4. Lisa Loiacono is Christopher Lloyd’s lucky number five

Christopher Lloyd has been in five marriages since he first got married at 21. However, four of his marriages have ended in divorce. Lloyd has been with Lisa for six years and considers her the lucky number five, and that five is the last, meaning he may never marry a sixth wife.

5. Lisa Loiacono and Christopher Lloyd’s ex-wife hang out together

After Lisa conducted a real estate transaction involving Christopher Lloyd and Jane Walker Wood, the three stayed in touch and became friends. In an interview with The Guardian, Lisa admits that she hikes with Lloyd’s ex-wife every morning. However, the two hanging out has never bothered Lloyd because he says he can deal with it, and he is glad they are having fun.

Who did Christopher Lloyd marry?

Christopher Lloyd is 83 years old in 2022 and has been in five marriages throughout his lifetime. The women he has married are:

Catherine Boyd

Christopher Lloyd married actress Catherine Dallas Dixon Boyd on 6 June 1959 when he was 21 years old. Their marriage ceremony took place at a Church in Westport. Lloyd and Boyd were upcoming film actors and had not established themselves in Hollywood. The couple stayed together for 12 years after they divorced in 1971. Despite being together for 12 years, Lloyd and Boyd never had children.

Kay Tornborg

Christopher Lloyd met Kay Tornborg in 1972, one year after divorcing Catherine Boyd. The two dated for two years and got married in 1974. Lloyd and Tornborg stayed together as a married couple for 13 years. They divorced in 1987. Like his previous marriage, Christopher Lloyd did not have any children with Kay Tornborg.

Carol Ann Vanek

In 1988, Christopher Lloyd married his third wife, Carol Ann Vanek. The couple were together for only three years when they divorced in July 1991. Lloyd and Vanek did not have children.

Jane Walker Wood

Christopher Lloyd married Canadian journalist turned screenwriter Jane Walker Wood in 1992, a year after divorcing Carol Ann Vanek. The couple enjoyed 13 years of marriage before divorcing in 2005. Lloyd and Wood did not have children when they divorced.

Lisa Loiacono

It took Christopher Lloyd 11 years to get back to the dating scene. Then, in 2016, he married Lisa Loiacono, becoming his fifth wife. So how did Christopher Lloyd meet his wife? Christopher Lloyd met Lisa Loiacono in 2012 when she worked as a real estate agent.

Lloyd was selling his house in Montecito, California, in 2012. He had shared the house with his ex-wife Jane Walker Wood whom he had divorced after three years of marriage. Lisa was the agent involved in the negotiations and transactions. The two stayed in touch, became friends, and dated for four years. Finally, Lisa Loiacono's wedding happened in 2016, becoming Lloyd’s fifth wife.

Lisa Loiacono is an American real estate agent best known as the wife of actor Christopher Lloyd. Loiacono and Lloyd met in 2012 and married in 2016, despite having an age difference of 32 years. The couple has been together for six years but does not have children. Before marrying Lisa, Lloyd had been in four marriages with Catherine Dallas Dixon Boyd, Kay Tornborg, Carol Ann Vanek, and Jane Walker Wood. All marriages ended in divorce without children.
